remarks: The distance function is transferred across an image structure under a bijection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
imasdsf1o.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasdsf1o.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasdsf1o.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
imasdsf1o.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasdsf1o.e $e |- E = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( V X. V ) ) $.
imasdsf1o.d $e |- D = ( dist ` U ) $.
imasdsf1o.m $e |- ( ph -> E e. ( *Met ` V ) ) $.
imasdsf1o.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
imasdsf1o.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
imasdsf1o $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` X ) D ( F ` Y ) ) = ( X E Y ) ) $.
